feed.title: Translational Exercise Biomedicine
feed.subtitle: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in Translational Exercise Biomedicine

entry.title: Validation of marathon performance model based on physiological factors in world-class East African runners: a case series

entry.title: Mitochondrial and cardiovascular responses to aerobic exercise training in supine and upright positions in healthy young adults: a randomized parallel arm trial

entry.title: Exercise-induced neurogenesis through BDNF-TrkB pathway: implications for neurodegenerative disorders
entry.summary: Article by Jun Jie Lee, Patrick Henry Sebastian Sitjar, Eng Tat Ang, Jorming Goh DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/teb-2024-0038

entry.title: The role of osteoprotegerin (OPG) in exercise-induced skeletal muscle adaptation
entry.summary: Article by Aaron Owens, Livia Dos Santos, Matthew Brook, John Hunt, Mathew Piasecki, Jessica Piasecki DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/teb-2024-0033

entry.title: Impact of early and late morning supervised blood flow restriction training on body composition and skeletal muscle performance in older inactive adults
entry.summary: Article by Logan E. Peskett, Amy M. Thomson, Julia K. Arnason, Yadab Paudel, Martin Sénéchal DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/teb-2024-0025

entry.title: Anti-obesity drugs alone or combined with exercise training in the management of obesity: a systematic review with meta-analysis
